title: NLCS: Mike Clevinger and Padres Are Overwhelmed in Philadelphia
description: “This is probably one of the worst days of my life,” said San Diego’s starter, Mike Clevinger. “That sums it up.”
dc:creator: Tyler Kepner
media:description: Staked to a four-run lead in the first inning, San Diego’s Mike Clevinger failed to record an out and was charged with three earned runs.
